name: Sanjush S
text: Friendly atmosphere. No rush. Doctors are friendly and professional. Calm and quiet. Friendly staff.

name: Anupama Panoli
text: Had an amazing experience at Dr Roots Denta Care. They have such a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The doctors were truly patient in hearing our concerns and gave a detailed explanation of the procedures. Highly recommend to family and friends.

name: Sreerag C D
text: I highly recommend Dr Arun. He is very friendly and professional. I had a root canal treatment as well as a crown placement ‚Äî it was a great experience with no complaints at all. He is well experienced in his field.

name: Resmi P. G
text: I strongly suggest Dr Roots Denta Care for all your dental needs. The clinic offers experienced and compassionate doctors, friendly staff, hygienic facilities, post-surgery support, and affordable rates. Treatments are done with strict safety precautions.

name: Senthilkumar
text: Best dental care clinic near the Indira Gandhi Stadium. Friendly and professional service.

name: Aps Chh
text: I visited Dr Sreelakshmi and Dr Arun with severe tooth pain. They were very caring and treated me well. This is my go-to place for dental troubles.

name: Soma Vekkode
text: Excellent service. The ambience is great ‚Äî neat, tidy, and well arranged. The treatments are efficient and pocket-friendly. Overall a great experience.

name: Laveshkumar K K
text: Good place for all dental procedures. Experienced doctors and a pleasant clinic ambience. üëçüèø

name: Anil Varghese
text: Neat and clean clinic with modern equipment and affordable fees.

name: Sreelakshmi V Menon
text: Very patient-friendly experience and excellent treatment.
